isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - CAB DOOR COURTESY LIGHT ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Cab Door Courtesy Light Assembly
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position courtesy light assembly (Item 8) in place in cab door lower trim panel (Item 3) and install courtesy light mounting screws (Item 7) and tighten.

Hold cab door lower trim panel (Item 3) near cab door and connect courtesy light cable connector (Item 5) to wiring harness courtesy light connector (Item 6). Position cab door lower trim panel on cab door and install seven pan head torx screws (Item 4) around outer edge of cab door lower trim panel.
If vehicle is equipped with manually operated door windows install window regulator handle and washer (Item 2) and install hex socket head mach. screw (Item 1).

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Side Cab Door Courtesy Light Assembly
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position courtesy light assembly (Item 10) in place in cab door lower trim panel (Item 5) and install courtesy light mounting screws (Item 9) and tighten.

Hold cab door lower trim panel (Item 5) near cab door and connect courtesy light cable connector (Item 7) to wiring harness courtesy light connector (Item 8). Position cab door lower trim panel on cab door and install seven pan head torx screws (Item 6) around outer edge of cab door lower trim panel.
If vehicle is equipped with manually operated door windows install window regulator handle and washer (Item 2) and install hex socket head mach. screw (Item 1).
Position passenger door inner view glass assembly (Item 4) into cab door lower trim panel (Item 5) and install four mounting screws (Item 3) to secure it.
